summary: THE GEAR BOX MALFUNCTIONED.  *JB  THE TRANSMISSION STUCK IN LOW GEAR.  THERE WAS DOUBLE HESITATION WHEN MOVING FROM LOW GEAR (IN AUTOMATIC MOVE), AND DID NOT OCCUR BEFORE THE LAST GEAR BOX FAULT.  THE A/C SCREEN BLINKED ON/OFF.  THE AUDIO UNIT WAS REPROGRAMMED, THE MODULE WAS RECONFIGURED, THE GEAR SELECTOR WAS REPLACED, AND THE TRANSMISSION WAS REPLACED.  *SCC
